__e: It is important, ask why he hid his name.
Ask your minister how come he's making goo-goo eyes at a white gal.
Okay, get a list of what's missing and call Jane and ask him why he isn't here already.
Could you just say her husband called, and ask her to call me back?
A man has followed me from London Bridge Station. If they arrest me before I finish my story, make them give me time so that I may tell you the whole truth.
Ask him to stand by in court tomorrow. He may be needed.
Go to my husband, and ask him not to kill my baby.

But after that... it's my turn.
Ask him if he can get to the beach below his position... and how long it'll take him.
Ask him if he still has the last letter I sent to his mother.
Ask him if he's aware that the charge against me is a lie, and that everyone here knows it.
